item.description:
@bed240 wrote:

ye ive managed it be4 but im tryin to make skill capes given out liek real rs kinda so i tried but i click the npc and i dont get naything please if you know why it would be realy kl

else if (NPCID == 216) { skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX; skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY; if(playerLevel[5] >= 99) { } if(playerHasItem(2347) == true) { addItem(7640, 1); addItem(7641, 1); } else if(playerLevel[2] <= 99) { sendMessage("you need 99 prayer to recive prayer your cape n hood"); } if(playerHasItem(995) == false) { sendMessage("you need 100k to recive your prayer cape n hood"); } }

i click on the npc and nothing happens :s[br][size=1]Posted on: September 09, 2007, 06:23:25 AM[/size][hr]ops sori the item is wrong “2347” should be “995”
